item.description: Sunday, Sept. 2, 2007- Larz Anderson Park - Let's get together for a Labor Day cookout. I'm going to apply for a permit with the town of Brookline and reserve a grill setup there. Everybody can bring whatever they want to eat. We can meet at 1:00 pm. We can start with a walk around the park and then proceed with the cookout. Look forward to seeing you. The permit cost is $25.00 so in addition to the $1. organizer fee there will be a nominal charge toward the permit, depending on how many people participate.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: LABOR DAY COOKOUT - LARZ ANDERSON PARK
